titleStmt.title: An elegy upon the death of that Holy, Reverend, and Learned Minister of Christ Mr Richard Baxter who in the 77th year of his age departed this life Decemb. the 8th, 1691 / by N. Vincent.
titleStmt.author: Vincent, Nathanael, 1639?-1697.
